title: My email was disabled by my school and I could not change the email of my account
body:
The email associated with this account was disabled by my school as I am no longer studying there. 

I tried submitting support ticket but I was required to provide information about the origin of my account which was at least 4 years ago, and I got a reply saying that my information provided "does not match this account", which certainly did not as it was 4 years ago (I tried giving a range of answers but apparently they were all wrong). The worse thing is I don't even know what questions I got wrong.

I am even more frustrated when I found out that my account got permanently banned after I submitted the ticket and so now I can't even play the game! If I hadn't submitted the ticket this wouldn't happen and I wish I did not submit the ticket  so that I can still be able to play league of legends. 

Here is the ticket that started this whole thing:
http://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/25104754
Edit: I think only riot people can access the link
Please can someone help me with the problem{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
Unfortunately, we aren't equipped to assist with account recoveries here on Help & Support. The best thing you can do right now is go over the questions the specialists asked you and do your best to provide the most accurate information as possible.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
